opam.name: yojson
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "martin@mjambon.com"
authors: "Martin Jambon"
homepage: "http://mjambon.com/yojson.html"
bug-reports: "https://github.com/mjambon/yojson/issues"
depends: [
  "jbuilder" {build}
  "cppo" {build}
  "easy-format"
  "biniou" {>= "1.2.0"}
]
available: ocaml-version >= "4.02.3"
build: ["jbuilder" "build" "-p" name "-j" jobs]
run-test: ["jbuilder" "runtest" "-p" name]
dev-repo: "git+https://github.com/mjambon/yojson.git"

opam.name: topkg
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "Daniel B端nzli <daniel.buenzl i@erratique.ch>"
authors: "Daniel B端nzli <daniel.buenzl i@erratique.ch>"
license: "ISC"
tags: ["packaging" "ocamlbuild" "org:erratique"]
homepage: "http://erratique.ch/software/topkg"
doc: "http://erratique.ch/software/topkg/doc"
bug-reports: "https://github.com/dbuenzli/topkg/issues"
depends: [
  "ocamlfind" {build & >= "1.6.1"}
  "ocamlbuild"
  "result"
]
available: ocaml-version >= "4.01.0"
build: [
  "ocaml" "pkg/pkg.ml" "build" "--pkg-name" name "--dev-pkg" "%{pinned}%"
]
dev-repo: "git+http://erratique.ch/repos/topkg.git"

opam.name: result
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "opensource@janestreet.com"
authors: "Jane Street Group, LLC <opensource@janestreet.com>"
license: "BSD3"
homepage: "https://github.com/janestreet/result"
bug-reports: "https://github.com/janestreet/result/issues"
depends: [
  "jbuilder" {build & >= "1.0+beta11"}
]
build: ["jbuilder" "build" "-p" name "-j" jobs]
dev-repo: "git+https://github.com/janestreet/result.git"

files.name: _esy/build
files.content:
#!/bin/bash

set -euo pipefail
set -x

#
# Shim OCAMLLIB so that we can write topfind there
#

REAL_OCAMLLIB="$1"

mkdir -p $cur__install/lib/ocaml
cd $cur__install/lib/ocaml

for filename in `ls -1 $REAL_OCAMLLIB`; do
  ln -s $REAL_OCAMLLIB/$filename $filename;
done

#
# Build
#

cd $cur__root

export OCAMLLIB="$cur__install/lib/ocaml"

./configure \
  -bindir $cur__install/bin \
  -sitelib $cur__install/lib \
  -mandir $cur__install/man \
  -config $cur__install/lib/findlib.conf \
  -no-custom \
  -no-camlp4

make all
make opt
make install

(opam-installer --prefix=$cur__install || true)

opam.name: ocamlfind
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "Thomas Gazagnaire <thomas@gazagnaire.org>"
authors: "Gerd Stolpmann <gerd@gerd-stolpmann.de>"
homepage: "http://projects.camlcity.org/projects/findlib.html"
bug-reports: "https://gitlab.camlcity.org/gerd/lib-findlib/issues"
depends: [
  "conf-m4" {build}
]
available: ocaml-version >= "4.00.0"
build: [
  [
    "./configure"
    "-bindir"
    bin
    "-sitelib"
    lib
    "-mandir"
    man
    "-config"
    "%{lib}%/findlib.conf"
    "-no-custom"
    "-no-topfind" {preinstalled}
  ]
  [make "all"]
  [make "opt"] {ocaml-native}
]
install: [
  [make "install"]
  ["install" "-m" "0755" "ocaml-stub" "%{bin}%/ocaml"] {preinstalled}
]
remove: [
  ["ocamlfind" "remove" "bytes"]
  [
    "./configure"
    "-bindir"
    bin
    "-sitelib"
    lib
    "-mandir"
    man
    "-config"
    "%{lib}%/findlib.conf"
    "-no-topfind" {preinstalled}
  ]
  [make "uninstall"]
  ["rm" "-f" "%{bin}%/ocaml"] {preinstalled}
]
dev-repo: "git+https://gitlab.camlcity.org/gerd/lib-findlib.git"

opam.name: ocamlbuild
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "Gabriel Scherer <gabriel.scherer@gmail.com>"
authors: ["Nicolas Pouillard" "Berke Durak"]
license: "LGPL-2 with OCaml linking exception"
homepage: "https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlbuild/"
doc: "https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlbuild/blob/master/manual/manual.adoc"
bug-reports: "https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlbuild/issues"
conflicts: [
  "base-ocamlbuild"
  "ocamlfind" {< "1.6.2"}
]
available: ocaml-version >= "4.03"
build: [
  [
    make
    "-f"
    "configure.make"
    "all"
    "OCAMLBUILD_PREFIX=%{prefix}%"
    "OCAMLBUILD_BINDIR=%{bin}%"
    "OCAMLBUILD_LIBDIR=%{lib}%"
    "OCAMLBUILD_MANDIR=%{man}%"
    "OCAML_NATIVE=%{ocaml-native}%"
    "OCAML_NATIVE_TOOLS=%{ocaml-native}%"
  ]
  [make "check-if-preinstalled" "all" "opam-install"]
]
dev-repo: "git+https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlbuild.git"

opam.name: mccs
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "Louis Gesbert <louis.gesbert@ocamlpro.com>"
authors: [
  "Claude Michel <claude.michel@unice.fr>"
  "Louis Gesbert <louis.gesbert@ocamlpro.com>"
]
license: "LGPL-2.1 with OCaml linking exception, BSD-3-clause, GPL-3.0"
homepage: "http://www.i3s.unice.fr/~cpjm/misc/"
bug-reports: "https://github.com/AltGr/ocaml-mccs/issues"
depends: [
  "jbuilder" {build}
  "cudf" {>= "0.7"}
]
build: ["jbuilder" "build" "-p" name]
run-test: [
  ["sh" "-c" "jbuilder build @settests --auto-promote || true"]
  ["jbuilder" "runtest"]
]
dev-repo: "git+https://github.com/AltGr/ocaml-mccs.git"

opam.name: jbuilder
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "opensource@janestreet.com"
authors: "Jane Street Group, LLC <opensource@janestreet.com>"
license: "MIT"
homepage: "https://github.com/ocaml/dune"
bug-reports: "https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues"
depends: ["dune"]
post-messages:
  "Jbuilder has been renamed and the jbuilder package is now a transition package. Use the dune package instead."
dev-repo: "git+https://github.com/ocaml/dune.git"

opam.name: extlib-compat
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "ygrek@autistici.org"
authors: [
  "Nicolas Cannasse"
  "Brian Hurt"
  "Yamagata Yoriyuki"
  "Markus Mottl"
  "Jesse Guardiani"
  "John Skaller"
  "Bardur Arantsson"
  "Janne Hellsten"
  "Richard W.M. Jones"
  "ygrek"
  "Gabriel Scherer"
  "Pietro Abate"
]
license: "LGPL-2.1 with OCaml linking exception"
homepage: "https://github.com/ygrek/ocaml-extlib"
doc: "http://ygrek.org.ua/p/extlib/doc/"
bug-reports: "https://github.com/ygrek/ocaml-extlib/issues"
depends: [
  "ocamlfind" {build}
  "cppo" {build}
  "base-bytes" {build}
]
conflicts: ["extlib"]
available: ocaml-version < "4.07.0"
build: [make "build"]
run-test: [make "test"]
install: [make "install"]
remove: ["ocamlfind" "remove" "extlib"]
dev-repo: "git://github.com/ygrek/ocaml-extlib.git"
build-doc: [make "doc"]

opam.name: extlib
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "ygrek@autistici.org"
authors: [
  "Nicolas Cannasse"
  "Brian Hurt"
  "Yamagata Yoriyuki"
  "Markus Mottl"
  "Jesse Guardiani"
  "John Skaller"
  "Bardur Arantsson"
  "Janne Hellsten"
  "Richard W.M. Jones"
  "ygrek"
  "Gabriel Scherer"
  "Pietro Abate"
]
license: "LGPL-2.1 with OCaml linking exception"
homepage: "https://github.com/ygrek/ocaml-extlib"
doc: "http://ygrek.org.ua/p/extlib/doc/"
bug-reports: "https://github.com/ygrek/ocaml-extlib/issues"
depends: [
  "ocamlfind" {build}
  "cppo" {build}
  "base-bytes" {build}
]
build: [make "minimal=1" "build"]
run-test: [make "minimal=1" "test"]
install: [make "minimal=1" "install"]
remove: ["ocamlfind" "remove" "extlib"]
dev-repo: "git://github.com/ygrek/ocaml-extlib.git"
build-doc: [make "minimal=1" "doc"]

opam.name: easy-format
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "martin@mjambon.com"
authors: "Martin Jambon"
homepage: "http://mjambon.com/easy-format.html"
bug-reports: "https://github.com/mjambon/easy-format/issues"

  "jbuilder" {build}
]
available: ocaml-version >= "4.02.3"
build: ["jbuilder" "build" "-p" name "-j" jobs]
run-test: ["jbuilder" "runtest" "-p" name]

opam.name: dune
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "opensource@janestreet.com"
authors: "Jane Street Group, LLC <opensource@janestreet.com>"
license: "MIT"
homepage: "https://github.com/ocaml/dune"
bug-reports: "https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues"
conflicts: [
  "jbuilder" {!= "transition"}
]
available: ocaml-version >= "4.02.3"
build: [
  ["ocaml" "configure.ml" "--libdir" lib]
  ["ocaml" "bootstrap.ml"]
  ["./boot.exe" "--release" "--subst"] {pinned}
  ["./boot.exe" "--release" "-j" jobs]
]
dev-repo: "git+https://github.com/ocaml/dune.git"

opam.name: cudf
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "roberto@dicosmo.org"
authors: [
  "Roberto di Cosmo <roberto@dicosmo.org>"
  "Stefano Zacchiroli"
  "Pietro Abate"
]
homepage: "http://www.mancoosi.org/cudf/"
bug-reports:
  "https://gforge.inria.fr/tracker/?atid=13811&group_id=4385&func=browse"
depends: [
  "conf-perl" {build}
  ("extlib" | "extlib-compat")
  "ocamlbuild" {build}
]
build: [make "all" "opt"]
install: [
  make
  "install"
  "DESTDIR=%{prefix}%/"
  "OCAMLLIBDIR=lib"
  "BINDIR=bin"
  "LIBDIR=lib"
  "INCDIR=include"
]
remove: [
  make
  "uninstall"
  "DESTDIR=%{prefix}%/"
  "OCAMLLIBDIR=lib"
  "BINDIR=bin"
  "LIBDIR=lib"
  "INCDIR=include"
]
dev-repo: "git+https://scm.gforge.inria.fr/anonscm/git/cudf/cudf.git"

opam.name: cppo
opam.opam:
opam-version: "1.2"
maintainer: "martin@mjambon.com"
authors: "Martin Jambon"
license: "BSD-3-Clause"
homepage: "https://github.com/mjambon/cppo"
bug-reports: "https://github.com/mjambon/cppo/issues"
depends: [
  "jbuilder" {build & >= "1.0+beta17"}
  "base-bytes"
  "base-unix"
]
build: [
  ["jbuilder" "subst" "-p" name] {pinned}
  ["jbuilder" "build" "-p" name "-j" jobs]
]
run-test: ["jbuilder" "runtest" "-p" name]
dev-repo: "git+https://github.com/mjambon/cppo.git"

conf-perl
